sense.gloss: waving (e.g. of a flag in the wind)
to brandish, to flash, to display
to flash (e.g. lightning), to flicker, to glitter, to sparkle, to gleam
to flutter (e.g. flag), to wave, to undulate
to flash into one's mind (e.g. an idea), to come to one suddenly

r_ele.r: かこうせんりょくがん

sense.gloss: flash of lightning, flash of a sword, brandishing a sword

sdata.j: アジアの↑宗教↑↓しゅうきょう↓から↑閃↑↓ひらめ↓きを↑得↑↓え↓て、↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑複数↑↓ふくすう↓の↑素晴↑↓すば↓らしい↑彫刻↑↓ちょうこく↓を↑生↑↓う↓み↑出↑↓だ↓した。
sdata.e: Asian religions inspire him to create splendid sculptures.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑稲妻↑↓いなづま↓の↑閃光↑↓せんこう↓を↑見↑↓み↓て↑悲鳴↑↓ひめい↓をあげた。
sdata.e: She screamed at the flash of lightning.

sdata.j: そして、そういいながら、↑自分↑↓じぶん↓を↑誘惑↑↓ゆうわく↓した↑男↑↓おとこ↓、↑戯↑↓おどけ↓↑談↑↓だん↓のようにいい↑寄↑↓よ↓った↑夫↑↓おっと↓の↑同僚↑↓どうりょう↓の↑一↑↓いち↓↑人↑↓にん↓、↑手↑↓て↓を↑握↑↓にぎ↓った↑会社↑↓かいしゃ↓の↑課長↑↓かちょう↓、↑酔↑↓よ↓って↑接吻↑↓せっぷん↓をしようとした↑親族↑↓しんぞく↓の↑男↑↓おとこ↓などを、くだけた↑鏡↑↓かがみ↓に↑写↑↓うつ↓っている↑記憶↑↓きおく↓のように、きらきらと、↑閃↑↓ひらめ↓かせた。
sdata.e: Then, while saying this, the memories of the men who had seduced her, her husband's colleague who had approached her as if it were a joke, the section chief with whom she had held hands, her relative who she had tried to kiss while she was drunk, shined as if projected upon a broken mirror.
